message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you get $30.  It's best to settle this now before inflation eats away at the value.
I think we can both do better. Let's split it more evenly.  I'll take 55, and you can have 45.  This is a fair deal for both of us, and it's a good way to avoid further inflation.
Bob, that last offer was ridiculous! This is my final offer - I get $65 and you get $35.  If we don't settle now, the deal will only get worse for both of us.
